short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: More than the default image viewer
short.ja: 画像観覧をもっと使いやすいように機能を強化します
short.zh_CN: 更多功能、更方便的图像浏览
short.zh_TW: 更多功能、更易使用的圖像瀏覽

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Image Viewer is a Chrome extension for improve your images viewing experiences.

Web Demo: https://hospotho.github.io/Image-Viewer/
Full manual: https://github.com/hospotho/Image-Viewer

Features
1. Collect and view all images on the page.
2. Support video poster, canvas element and images in iframes.
3. Auto load most lazy loaded images.
4. Redirect middle click to original image
5. Go to original image on the page.
6. Fit, zoom, rotate and mirror the image.
7. Hotkey for image reverse search.
8. Download collected images.
9. Easy to use.
10. And more...

For bugs or questions, please email me or open an issue on GitHub.

You can buy me a coffee on https://ko-fi.com/tonymilktea
